Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav smashed 68 not out off just 26 balls
Virat Kohli finished unbeaten on 59 off 44, including one four and three sixes
Suryakumar hit Haroon's first three deliveries for sixes in the last over of the innings
Nizakat Khan was run out on the last ball of the powerplay
Hong Kong could manage only 152 for 5
Post-Match Reflections: India cruised into the Super 4 round of the Asia Cup
It was a far from perfect game for India, with Avesh Khan and Arshdeep Singh looking off colour
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma and KL Rahul started slowly, managing just six runs in the first two overs
Babar Hayat smashed Bhuvneshwar Kumar and Avesh over their heads for a six off each in the sixth over
Hong Kong added 31 off 22 balls for the fourth wicket through Kinchit Shah and Aizaz
